title: Ring of Kerry
description:
The Innisfallen Hotel is conveniently located in Fossa, the gateway to the ring of Kerry. This 179km scenic drive around the Iveragh Peninsula is one of the most breath-taking trips in Ireland and a key part of the 'Wild Atlantic Way'. The circular route takes in rugged and verdant costal landscapes and rural seaside villages.

Along the way is Skellig Michael, a rocky island with an abandoned 7th century Christian monastery that was recently used in the filming of the new Star Wars film. Boat trips are available from Portmagee during the summer months and the 12km trip out to the Island is a trip not to be missed.
